pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, October 27, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, October 27, 2017:

Montr√©al, Quebec

11 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the funeral for the Honourable Michael Pitfield and will deliver remarks.

St. George's Anglican Church

Closed to media

Saint-Bruno-de-Montarville, Quebec

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will highlight changes to the Canada Child Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Saint-Bruno-de-Montarville Municipal Library
82 Seigneurial Boulevard West
 
Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 2 p.m.
